name: its-mytabs
description: its-mytabs is a self hosted start page that groups browser tabs and links into organized collections. It is designed as a simple, personal homepage to quickly access frequently used sites and web apps in a tidy layout.
features: Tab Organization: Group related links and tabs into organized collections.
Start Page: Use as your browser's homepage for quick access to frequent sites.
Link Collections: Create categories for work, personal, and other link groups.
Simple Interface: Clean, straightforward layout without unnecessary features.
Quick Access: Launch frequently used web apps and sites with one click.
Personal Dashboard: Customize your own homepage with your most-used links.
Lightweight: Fast loading with minimal resource usage.
Self-Hosted: Keep your browsing shortcuts on your own server.
